td.content: s:patient complains of mild flatulence, mild diarrhea and Stomach. NKDA. she is a white female vicar aged 52 yrs. she is a heavy drinker she has a history of smoking o:Height 173 cm, Weight 53.7 kg, Temperature 37.3 C, Pulse 80, SystolicBP 111, DiastolicBP 69, Respiration 16, all lung fields, Abdomen = mild tenderness to deep palpitation, HEENT: WNL, Heart = RRR, Normal S1/S2, no murmurs a:Severe Indigestion p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed famotidine - 40 mg daily, and ordered serum helicobacter pylori assay.
